reviews.review_msg: very knowledgeable and passionate about his topics. wants you to actually read all of his readings but is always accessible during office hours to talk.
Very passionate, genuinely interested in the subject hes teaching.

This is could have been a very interesting class but Dimitios just sucks the life out of it. He is more interested in filling a hour and a half session than actually teaching. And his grading is far to difficult. He's a nice guy but if you care about your gpa, don't take one of his classes
